::FireBlade::
FireBlade wondered if this would be the real SwitchBlade, the one 
from old Cybertron. As he continued to walk he hoped for the best for 
he was nervous at what events may arise as he got nearer and nearer 
to the base.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> ::Switchblade::
> Switchblade feels something... something familiar, something from 
> the past, something from Cybertron... FireBlade! "Wha.... no, not 
> possible!" He mutters to himself considering the possibilities that 
> may arise from this unexpected arrival. "Hey Megs, what'cha want?"
> 
> 
> On 23 Mar 2001, at 20:38, whyteboy08@h... wrote:
> 
> > FireBlade followed the bleep until he could feel he close. AS he 
> > neared his target he transformed and became to walk toward the 
base 
> > where his old ally, his best friend, the one he was programmed to 
die 
> > for if the need be, the base where SwitchBlade was stationed.
> >
